original_text: and they shall say to the elders of his city, ‘This our son is stubborn and rebellious; he will not obey our voice; he is a glutton and a drunkard.’
korean_text: 그 성읍 장로들에게 말하기를 우리의 이 자식은 완악하고 패역하여 우리 말을 듣지 아니하고 방탕하며 술에 잠긴 자라 하면

sentences.original_text: and they shall say to the elders of his city,
‘This our son is stubborn and rebellious;
he will not obey our voice;
he is a glutton and a drunkard.’
